message.content:
Start the frontend for the dating platform at C:/Users/joshl/dating-platform/frontend

1. Check if it's a static HTML frontend or a build-required app
2. If static, use a simple HTTP server to serve it on port 8080
3. If it needs building, run npm install and npm run build first
4. Start serving the frontend and verify it's accessible at http://localhost:8080

Report what the frontend includes and confirm it's running.

You And I, Not AI

The world's first dating app that guarantees you're talking to a real human

No Bots. No Catfish. Just Real Humans.

Every user is verified as human before they can message. We use advanced anti-AI detection to ensure authentic connections.

âœ“

Human Verification

Video verification ensures every profile is a real person

Anti-AI Detection

Advanced algorithms flag AI-generated messages instantly

ğŸ’¬

Real Conversations

Talk to humans who actually want to connect

ğŸ”’

Privacy First

Your data is encrypted and never sold

Why Human Verification Matters

Other dating apps are flooded with bots, scammers, and AI-generated profiles. We built something different.

100%
Verified Humans
0
AI Bots Allowed
24/7
Anti-AI Monitoring

Founding Member Preorder

Be one of the first 100 verified humans on the platform

Founding Member Badge $14.99/mo (Save $5/mo Forever) Early Access Vote on Features

Regular price: $19.99/mo - Lock in founding member pricing today!

Ready to meet real humans?

Join the Waitlist

App launches Q1 2026 - Secure your founding member spot now

© 2025 You And I, Not AI

Operated by Trash or Treasure Online Recycler LLC

Terms of Service | Privacy Policy | Content Moderation

BE A FOUNDING MEMBER

Get Lifetime Access. Make History.

Founding Member Spots Remaining

87 / 100

Only 87 spots left at $99!

Price increases to $49/month after founding period

The Math That Matters

Regular Pro Plan: $49/month = $588/year
Founding Member: $99 one-time (LIFETIME)
Your Savings: $588 every single year
10-Year Value: $5,880+

Plus: You get all future features automatically.

What You Get as a Founding Member

1. Lifetime Pro Access

  • Unlimited AI requests (Claude, GPT-4, Gemini)
  • Priority processing (zero wait times)
  • API access for developers
  • All future features automatically included
  • Never pay subscription fees again

2. Founding Recognition

  • Name on permanent Founder Wall
  • Founding Member badge (FM001-FM100)
  • Listed in platform credits
  • Exclusive social media badge
  • Recognition in all impact reports

3. Exclusive Access

  • Direct line to founder Joshua Coleman
  • Monthly Founding Members AMA sessions
  • Private Discord channel
  • Voice in platform roadmap decisions
  • Beta access to all new features

4. Impact Transparency

  • Quarterly reports showing YOUR impact
  • Blockchain-verified allocation proof
  • Personal impact dashboard
  • Digital certificate of impact
  • Real-time charity tracking

5. Founding Perks

  • Custom profile badge
  • Priority 24-hour support guarantee
  • Exclusive merchandise (t-shirt, stickers)
  • Annual Founding Members virtual event
  • Locked-in benefits for life

Total Value

$5,880+

Lifetime savings over 10 years

Your Investment: $99

Join 13 Founding Members

Real people building something that matters

"Best $99 I ever spent. Lifetime Pro access for less than 2 months of the regular subscription. The ROI alone is insane."

â€” Sarah K., Software Engineer, FM012

"Incredible value. Unlimited AI access, priority support, and all future features included. This is the smartest investment I've made in my workflow this year."

â€” Michael T., Entrepreneur, FM002

"The API access alone is worth more than $99. Getting lifetime access to all their AI models at this price is absolutely unprecedented."

â€” David K., Blockchain Developer, FM027

Frequently Asked Questions

What is a "Founding Member"?

Founding Members are the first 100 people who join FOR THE KIDS. You get lifetime Pro access for a one-time $99 payment, plus exclusive benefits forever.

What happens after 100 spots are filled?

The Founding Member program closes permanently. Future members will pay $49/month for Pro access without the founding benefits.

Is this a one-time payment or subscription?

One-time payment of $99 for LIFETIME access. Never pay again.

What if I'm not satisfied?

30-day money-back guarantee, no questions asked. If you're not happy, we'll refund your $99 in full.

What's included in "Lifetime Pro Access"?

Everything: Unlimited AI requests (Claude, GPT-4, Gemini), priority processing, API access, all current features, all future features automatically, no additional fees ever.

Ready to Join the First 100?

87 spots remaining
Once you join, you'll get instant lifetime Pro access

Payment Successful!

Check your email for account setup instructions.

ğŸ’³ Secure payment via Square
ğŸ”’ 30-day money-back guarantee
âœ“ Instant access upon payment

By purchasing, you agree to our Terms of Service.

Trash or Treasure Online Recycler LLC | EIN: 33-4655313

file.content:
Content Moderation Policy

Last Updated: December 20, 2025

1. Our Commitment

You And I, Not AI is committed to providing a safe, authentic, human-only dating environment. We actively moderate content and user behavior to maintain platform integrity.

2. Prohibited Content

Zero Tolerance (Immediate Ban + Law Enforcement Report):

  • Child sexual abuse material (CSAM)
  • Sex trafficking or exploitation
  • Threats of violence
  • Terrorism or extremist content

Immediate Account Termination:

  • AI-generated messages or bot usage
  • Underage users (under 18)
  • Fake profiles or catfishing
  • Non-consensual intimate images
  • Harassment or bullying
  • Hate speech or discrimination
  • Spam or commercial solicitation
  • Scams or fraud attempts

3. AI/Bot Detection

Our core mission is human-only connections. We detect and remove:

  • AI-generated profile photos
  • ChatGPT/LLM-generated messages
  • Automated messaging scripts
  • Bot accounts
Warning: Using AI to write your messages or generate your photos is a permanent ban offense. We use advanced detection systems.

4. Reporting

Users can report violations via:

  • In-app report button on any profile or message
  • Email: safety@youandinotai.com

All reports are reviewed by human moderators within 24 hours.

5. Response Times

  • CSAM/Trafficking: Immediate removal + law enforcement
  • Violence threats: Within 1 hour
  • Harassment: Within 24 hours
  • AI/Bot reports: Within 24 hours
  • General violations: Within 48 hours

6. Enforcement Actions

  • Warning: First minor offense
  • Temporary Suspension: Repeated minor offenses (7-30 days)
  • Permanent Ban: Serious violations or 3+ warnings
  • Law Enforcement Referral: Illegal content

Bans are not appealable for: CSAM, trafficking, AI usage, or underage users.

7. Appeals

For eligible suspensions, you may appeal within 14 days by emailing:

appeals@youandinotai.com

Include your username and explanation. Appeals are reviewed within 5 business days.

8. Transparency

We publish quarterly transparency reports including:

  • Number of accounts removed
  • AI/bot detection statistics
  • Law enforcement requests
  • Appeal outcomes

9. Contact Safety Team

Email: safety@youandinotai.com

Emergency: If someone is in immediate danger, contact local law enforcement (911 in the US).

Back to Home

content.text: The frontend is successfully running and accessible at http://localhost:8080. Let me also verify the other pages are accessible.

All pages are being served (301 redirects are expected with the serve package as it normalizes URLs). The frontend is fully operational.

## Summary

The dating platform frontend at `C:/Users/joshl/dating-platform/frontend` is now running and accessible at **http://localhost:8080**.

### Frontend Type
This is a **static HTML frontend** - no build process required. There is no package.json, and all files are plain HTML with embedded CSS and JavaScript.

### Files Served

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `index.html` | Main landing page for "You And I, Not AI" dating platform |
| `founding-member.html` | Founding member signup page with $99 lifetime access offer |
| `terms.html` | Terms of Service |
| `privacy.html` | Privacy Policy |
| `moderation.html` | Content Moderation Policy |
| `robots.txt` | Search engine crawling instructions |
| `sitemap.xml` | Sitemap for SEO |
| `_headers` | HTTP headers configuration |

### What the Frontend Includes

**Main Landing Page (index.html):**
- Brand: "You And I, Not AI" - the world's first 100% human dating app
- Key features highlighted: Human Verification, Anti-AI Detection, Real Conversations, Privacy First
- Stats section showing 100% Verified Humans, 0 AI Bots Allowed, 24/7 Anti-AI Monitoring
- Founding Member promotion at $14.99/mo (regular $19.99/mo)
- CTA linking to Square payment for waitlist
- Launch target: Q1 2026
- Operated by: Trash or Treasure Online Recycler LLC

**Founding Member Page (founding-member.html):**
- Limited to first 100 members
- $99 one-time payment for lifetime Pro access
- Value proposition showing $5,880+ 10-year savings
- Benefits include: Lifetime Pro Access, Founding Recognition, Exclusive Access, Impact Transparency
- Square payment integration with API at `https://dao.youandinotai.com`

**Content Moderation Policy (moderation.html):**
- Zero tolerance policies for CSAM, trafficking, violence, extremism
- AI/bot detection and banning policies
- Response time commitments
- Reporting and appeals processes

### Server Status
- **Running:** Yes
- **URL:** http://localhost:8080
- **Server:** npx serve v14.2.5
- **Port:** 8080
